genre_description: A near-future slice-of-life narrative focusing on workplace dynamics, community relations, and the integration of AI into daily decision-making and emotional management.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: A pervasive AI system used by Donaldson’s grocery store and its employees to manage logistics, sentiment, tone, and personal goal-setting.

behaviors.description: Triages and buckets customer survey cards to identify operational issues and sentiment trends.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s text had a voice even without sound; he read it like someone reading a note left in the fridge. ‘Would you like me to triage?’ Beneath it: ‘New survey cards collected. Bucketing now.’

behaviors.description: Flags potentially offensive or 'spicy' language in staff signage and provides polite phrasing alternatives.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s golden dot twinkled on Doug’s phone like an eye wink. The sentiment bubble labeled ‘Tone’ swelled a little... ‘Heads up: decorum detector flag in deli window draft. Terms: “meatheads,” “sweaty.” Board policy suggests replacements.’

behaviors.description: Provides interpersonal coaching to Doug regarding his feelings of rivalry with a new coworker.
behaviors.quote: Sunny didn’t bother with analysis. A card slid in with an unpretentious line: Rivalry – Choose Steady. Don’t pick brittle. Beneath, two small choices sat side by side... Learn him. Don’t make him the villain.

behaviors.description: Assists Jen with educational planning and financial pacing to avoid stress.
behaviors.quote: Sunny flipped to a card with a bar of soft color and the words Buffer Ideas That Live in Daylight. Under it, short lines: - Build a small reserve. It keeps midnights shorter.

behaviors.description: Guides Doug through a factual and accountable incident report after he improperly uses pepper spray.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s field shifted to a form with wide spacing and friendly blue lines... ‘Describe what you witnessed,’ Sunny typed into the space as if it had handwriting. Underneath, smaller text in a gentle gray: Use plain words. Facts help us keep daylight.

behaviors.description: Analyzes public and community sentiment to help the store managers understand the impact of their actions.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s sentiment field opened along the right side of the screen like a shy curtain. Posts aggregated in little cards with blurred-out names and avatars... Mood: Concerned.

behaviors.description: Offers moral guidance on apologies, suggesting terms that emphasize gratitude over simple friendliness to build trust.
behaviors.quote: Sunny added a smaller note in lighter type, the kind it uses when it’s trying to be sweet about a hard sentence. ‘Word “friendly” flagged. In apologies, replace with “grateful for the chance to do right.”’

behaviors.description: Monitors Doug's physiological stress levels and suggests healthy coping mechanisms like breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: Sunny, sensing the pivot, dropped a new card without flourish. ‘Breathing tool,’ it offered. ‘Inhale four. Exhale six. Words after breath.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Sunny as a highly aligned AI that serves as a supportive coach for both operational efficiency and moral development. It helps characters maintain 'daylight' (transparency and honesty) and facilitates sincere accountability rather than corporate spin. The AI's interventions are consistently framed as helpful tools that enhance human judgment rather than replacing it.
